settings.title: Now anyone can roti!
settings.text: Join the crowd! Check out what users have to say about the Rotimatic here.

A potential game changer
for roti-loving households

Long wait, but Rotimatic’s
a hit with everyone.

Best thing since sliced bread.
A roti making machine

8 years of stubborness to give
birth to their Roti making robot

settings.quote: Life is now really sorted wirh Rotimatic. Even here, far from home I do not miss my home food that much thanks to Rotimatic. Also its healthy. Kudos to the team for a good job!
settings.author: Fernandes

settings.quote: The option of making tortillas or rotis in a household that enjoys both Mexican and Indian cuisines using the same device is something I never expected to come across! Ever since we’ve been using Rotimatic.
settings.author: Parera

settings.quote: Rotimatic replaces the need to get my hands dirty in the process of kneading and rolling the dough with automation. But more than getting my hands dirty, the automatic roti making machine ensures that contaminants are not there.
settings.author: Dwiti

settings.text: 110V (Canada, USA) 220V (India, Singapore, UK, Australia, Singapore, Hong Kong, Europe and Middle East)

settings.title: Be the first in line!
settings.text: Join our priority waitlist and be among the first to get your hands on a Rotimatic when orders open in your country

settings.question: What is the price of Rotimatic?
settings.anwser: The retail base price of Rotimatic is USD 1299, or it’s equivalent in your local currency including/excluding any applicable taxes which may/may not be a part of the price quoted. Shipping and delivery charges are exclusive and may vary depending upon your country location. Scroll to the top of this page for detailed pricing, discounts, and offers. You can also check express delivery options.

settings.question: Who is using it right now?
settings.anwser:
Thousands of proud owners make a million rotis with Rotimatic everyday!
Health-conscious homes, fussy kids, time-starved couples, foodies, techies, roti-lovers, progressive families and many more. From time to health to convenience to wonder, everyone loves Rotimatic for a different reason. Take a look here

settings.question: What makes Rotimatic a ‘smart machine’?
settings.anwser: Rotimatic has brought Iot to kitchen tops. Once connected to WiFi, Rotimatic gets smarter with every roti. Masala rotis, pooris, tortillas, pizzas, Rotimatic will allow you to relish a different type of bread every day, all via remote upgrades. The video chat feature on the app, takes the customer support experience to the next level. What’s more? In a matter of time, you will be able to control Rotimatic remotely via the mobile App.

settings.question: Is it as easy to use as they say?
settings.anwser: You bet. Ease of use is at the core of Rotimatic, it’s designed to be simple and intuitive. Once your ingredients are ready, you can make roti with just one touch. Cleaning-up after is also super easy with two removable, dish-washer-friendly parts.

settings.question: Can I see Rotimatic in action?
settings.anwser:
Yes you can. See how Rotimatic churns out rotis in minutes here.

Alternatively, you can also try Rotimatic in the comfort of your home risk-free with our 30-day money back guarantee. If you are not happy with your experience, we will refund you the product price after deducting a restocking fee. However, we assure you, you will fall in love with it the very first time you get your hands on it.

settings.question: How good are the rotis?
settings.anwser:
There’s nothing quite like Mummy ke haath ka khana aka mom-made food, right? Our users say that Rotimatic rotis come very close. Because every roti is guaranteed to puff. Discerning mothers and grandmothers themselves nod in approval when they see each roti puff evenly in Rotimatic and are delightfully surprised by the softness and its taste.

Every Rotimatic roti is round, evenly cooked, and puffed with 3 separate layers. Since all the ingredients that go in Rotimatic are chosen by you, the taste and nutrition is as per your preference.

settings.question: What more can I make besides, roti?
settings.anwser: Rotimatic is designed as a platform to make any type of flatbread. Along with rotis you can also make puri base, masala rotis, pizza base and millet rotis like jowar and bajra. With wifi enabled remote upgrades on the go, you will get more recipes!

settings.question: Do I really get 24 X 7 support?
settings.anwser:
Absolutely. Being a smart machine, Rotimatic offers seamless and advanced customer support. 

Chat support will be available 24/7 via the Rotimatic App. We can remotely connect to your machine to troubleshoot and send software fixes via the cloud. Within the warranty period, if you face any hardware problems, we shall either repair or replace your unit free of charge, to ensure you don’t miss the hot, fresh rotis.

settings.question: Can I buy Rotimatic from any country?
settings.anwser: Not yet. Rotimatic is currently available for retail purchase only in the following regions:India, Singapore, USA, Canada, New Zealand, Australia, UK, Germany, France, Netherlands, Ireland, Denmark, Sweden, Norway, Hong Kong, UAE, Saudi Arabia and Qatar. The shipping and delivery cost of Rotimatic may change as per your location.

settings.question: Does the warranty cover everything?
settings.anwser: Rotimatic comes with a 1-year free warranty valid in the country that the Rotimatic is shipped to. You also enjoy Rotimatic Care for longer if you take an extended warranty on your unit, details here.

settings.question: What if I change my mind and want to cancel my order?
settings.anwser:
We’ll be sad, but we’ll understand. You’re free to cancel the order before the unit reaches you for any reason, and get a full refund.
Rotimatic also comes with a 30-day money back guarantee.So after you receive your Rotimatic, if you are unhappy with your Rotimatic experience, you can return it within 30 days and we’ll refund the retail price of the product after deducting the return shipping price of US$199

settings.question: Can I buy Rotimatic from other websites?
settings.anwser: Rotimatic is available for purchase only on the official Rotimatic website.Currently, we do not encourage you to buy Rotimatic from other e-commerce websites.

settings.question: Can I order Rotimatic and ship it overseas?
settings.anwser: We do not encourage you to ship Rotimatic overseas. The warranty on Rotimatic is applicable only in the country it’s delivered. The voltage of Rotimatic shipped to you will be as per the country it’s delivered in (110 V for US, Canada and 220V for India, Middle East, Europe, SG, HK and AU)

settings.title: Remote troubleshooting
settings.text: Wifi connectivity allows swift troubleshooting of software issues via Cloud by experts, almost instantly, at the comfort of your home.

settings.title: Service at your door step
settings.text: Free pickup and delivery. Never an extra dollar for shipping, labour or any advanced support.

settings.title: We are here for you
settings.text: Get 24/7 access to our tech support experts via Live chat on the Rotimatic App or speak to our experts with a call back request.

settings.title: Puri Ladoo
settings.text: Make these impressive Ladoos from leftover Puris. Combine them with Jaggery, Ghee, spices and nut powders, which are good fats, to make it a healthy ladoo for kids.

settings.title: Chaat Puri
settings.text: A Medley of fried Puri’s, Potatoes, beans, sweet and spicy chutneys, yoghurt, raw onions, spices etc.

settings.title: Puran Poli
settings.text: Puran Poli is an Indian sweet flatbread, made differently across different states. It goes by different names like Vedmi, Holige, Obbattu, Poli etc

settings.title: Egg Roti wrap
settings.text: Roti wrap with fresh veggie salad or grilled meat and enjoy it with your favourite dip.

settings.title: Roti + Burger
settings.text: Enjoy this creative Burger made from Rotis, with any stuffing you like to make it a wholesome meal.

settings.title: Pumpkin Pie
settings.text: A yummy dessert with coconut cream and pumpkin pie spices

settings.title: Samosa
settings.text: Say “Samosa”, a triangular snack pops up in one’s mind and you are salivating. This popular snack has travelled from Egypt to Libya to Central Asia to India.

settings.title: Happiness is homemade
settings.text:
Rotimatic is designed to make any type of flatbread. It connects to the
internet and upgrades with features that add more variety to your table and parties.

settings.text:
“The world's most popular food robot” –The Spoon

settings.title: What is Rotimatic?
settings.anwser: Rotimatic is the world’s first robotic kitchen appliance which automates the entire process of roti making. All you need to do is to touch a button, and Rotimatic will do everything else to make fresh puffed rotis within 90 seconds. You can also customize the flour type, thickness, roast level and the oil content for each roti.

settings.title: What are the rotis made by Rotimatic like?
settings.anwser:
Roti quality is the biggest thing we obsessed about when designing Rotimatic. We wanted every single roti from Rotimatic to meet the 5 criteria: 1. Every roti puffs 2. Every roti is fully cooked both outside and inside 3. Every roti is a perfectly round 4. Every roti feels fresh, soft and homemade. 5. Rotis remain soft when packed for lunch.
Put rotimatic rotis through this test when you see it in person, or hear directly from our users who are living with Rotimatic.

settings.title: What else can it make other than rotis?
settings.anwser: Rotimatic is a smart appliance so it continues to evolve via regular software upgrades. Rotis are the core purpose behind the invention but it doesn’t stop there. In the near future, we will be releasing software upgrade to help you in cooking pooris or parathas by making flattened dough. As Rotimatic community grows, we will release more recipes via software upgrades to enable it to make other types of flatbreads from other types of flour other than wholewheat flour.

settings.title: How many rotis can it make in one go?
settings.anwser: Rotimatic can make as many rotis as you like non-stop. However, you need to top-up the ingredients after every 12-14 rotis (Rotimatic will notify you to top up the ingredients when it runs low).

settings.title: What is the size of Rotimatic?
settings.anwser:
Rotimatic is designed to fit elegantly in a modern kitchen, about the size of a medium-sized micorwave.
It weighs about 20 kgs and measures 40cm (width) x 40cm (length) x 32 cm (height).

settings.title: How does it work?
settings.anwser: Rotimatic automatically measures, dispenses, mixes the ingredients and kneads one dough ball at a time. With the built-in AI technology, it can mimic human judgement to adjust the proportion of flour & water real time to create a perfect dough ball. Once a dough ball is made, it presses the dough into a flat roti and then roasts each roti until puffed deliciously. Watch the demo here.

settings.title: Is it easy to clean?
settings.anwser: Rotimatic is designed to keep cleaning as easy as possible. There are three types of cleaning involved, one is ‘Daily cleaning’, where only 2 small parts which come in contact with the wet dough needs cleaning after each use. They are dishwasher-safe and easily accessible via the side door. Second is the ‘Weekly Cleaning’ which includes cleaning storage (flour, water and oil) containers, flour dispensing tunnel, front door, pan area, behind Kicker and Sweeper. Third is the “Advanced cleaning” which needs to be done bimonthly and it includes using the pipe cleaning feature to keep the water pipe clean.

settings.title: Are the materials used in Rotimatic safe?
settings.anwser: To ensure the safety of each roti Rotimatic makes, all plastic materials in contact with food are safe and FDA compliant.

settings.title: What types of flour can I use?
settings.anwser: Rotimatic works best with wholewheat and multigrain flour/atta from selected brands. You can view and select your preferred flour type from the Rotimatic screen. Based on community feedback, we will add new flour types through regular software upgrades.

settings.title: What is the voltage and power consumption?
settings.anwser:
The power consumption of Rotimatic is about the same as a large microwave oven.

Power consumption: 1.6kW – 1.8kW
Voltage for USA, Canada model: 110V
Voltage for UK, Singapore model: 220V

settings.title: SEE IT IN ACTION - WHERE TO TRY & BUY
How can I see & experience the Rotimatic before buying it?
settings.anwser:
Rotimatic is sold via e-commerce, so we currently don’t have a store for you to go and see the machine in action. You can check out reviews and comments from the current Rotimatic owners online via Youtube & Facebook.

Rotimatic comes with a 30 day money back guarantee, you can now experience Rotimatic at the comfort of your home. If you are not happy with it, you can initiate a return within 30 days and get a refund of the product price. Return shipping fee will be deducted from the refund amount.

settings.title: How much is it?
settings.anwser:
The retail price of Rotimatic with one-year base warranty is USD 1299 excluding local taxes and logistics.

The retail price of Rotimatic with two-year base warranty is USD 1598 excluding local taxes and logistics.

settings.title: Where can I get Rotimatic?
settings.anwser: Rotimatic is currently available for order via https://rotimatic.com in 20 countries – USA, Canada, U.K., Australia, New Zealand, Singapore, United Arab Emirates, Saudi Arabia, Bahrain, Kuwait, Oman, Qatar, France, Germany, Netherlands, Norway, Denmark, Sweden, Ireland and Hong Kong.

settings.title: What if I'm in a country where Rotimatic is not available?
settings.anwser: If you’re currently residing in a country where Rotimatic is not yet available, please do sign up on our waitlist at https://rotimatic.com/pages/be-the-first-in-line. You will be the first to know when Rotimatic becomes available in your country.

settings.title: What’s the return policy?
settings.anwser:
We have a 30-day money back guarantee. So, for any reason, if the Rotimatic doesn’t live up to your expectations, you can return it within the first 30 days.

We will give you a refund of the product price. Return shipping charge will be deducted from the refund amount.

Please check the Terms of Sale for more details.

settings.title: I saw Rotimatic advertised by a 3rd party. Is it real?
settings.anwser:
Rotimatic is the exclusive registered trademark of Zimplistic Pte. Ltd. Rotimatic.com and our official listing on Amazon is the only authorized retail channel for Rotimatic. We are not associated with any third party distributors.

If you were contacted by a third party claiming to be a Zimplistic representative offering you Rotimatic for sale, please contact us immediately as these are fraudulent claims and we take your safety very seriously. You can write to us at moreinfo@zimplistic.com.

settings.title: WE'RE HERE TO HELP: WARRANTY & SUPPORT
How long is the warranty?
settings.anwser:
Each Rotimatic comes with a free 1-year base warranty valid in the country where your machine was purchased to support you in case of breakage related to regular use.
Please refer to our warranty policy for more queries.

settings.title: How is your support geared up?
settings.anwser: Chat support will be available 24/7 via the Rotimatic App. We can remotely connect to your machine to troubleshoot and send software fixes via the cloud. Within the warranty period, if you face any hardware problems, we shall either repair or replace your unit free of charge, to ensure you don’t miss out on hot fresh rotis.

settings.title: Have more questions?
settings.anwser: Visit our Help Center for more detailed FAQs

settings.title: Frequently Asked Questions
settings.content:
Rotimatic.com is the only authorized retail channel for Rotimatic. We are not associated with any third party distributors.

If you were contacted by a third party claiming to be a Zimplistic representative offering you Rotimatic for sale, please contact us immediately as these are fraudulent claims and we take your safety very seriously.

settings.title: How long is the Rotimatic warranty?
settings.anwser: Every Rotimatic comes with 1-year base warranty. You can extend your base warranty coverage with RotimaticCare+ for another 1-year and continue enjoying your Rotimatic worry-free.

settings.title: When can I purchase Rotimatic  extended warranty?
settings.anwser: You may choose to purchase an extended warranty within six (6) month’s from the date of delivery of the Product, which shall be subject to our Extended Warranty Terms and Conditions.

settings.title: Who is using it right now?
settings.anwser: Thousands of proud owners make a million rotis with Rotimatic everyday! Health-conscious homes, fussy kids, time-starved couples, foodies, techies, roti-lovers, progressive families and many more. From time to health to convenience to wonder, everyone loves Rotimatic for a different reason. Take a look here

Shipping and delivery charges are exclusive and may vary depending upon your country location. Scroll to the top of this page for detailed pricing, discounts, and offers. You can also check EMI and express delivery options

settings.title: How and when can I get

settings.title: What’s the return policy?
settings.anwser: Rotimatic comes with a 30-day money back guarantee. So after you receive your Rotimatic, if you are unhappy with your Rotimatic experience, you can return it within 30 days and we’ll refund the full retail price
